    • Constructor Detail

      • CNode

        public CNode​(int j,
             int[] inX,
             int[] paY)
        CNode - A Node 'j', taking inputs from all parents inX and paY.
        Parameters:
        j - the label index of this node
        inX - attribute indices going into this node
        paY - label indices going into this node

    • Method Detail

      • getParentsY

        public int[] getParentsY​()
        getParentsY - get the parents (indices) of this node

      • transform

        public weka.core.Instances transform​(weka.core.Instances D)
                              throws Exception
        Transform - transform dataset D for this node. this.j defines the current node index, e.g., 3 this.paY[] defines parents, e.g., [1,4] we should remove the rest, e.g., [0,2,5,...,L-1]
        Returns:
        dataset we should remove all variables from D EXCEPT current node, and parents.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • build

        public void build​(weka.core.Instances D,
                  weka.classifiers.Classifier H)
           throws Exception
        Build - Create transformation for this node, and train classifier of type H upon it. The dataset should have class as index 'j', and remove all indices less than L *not* in paY.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • distribution

        public double[] distribution​(weka.core.Instance x,
                             double[] ypred)
                      throws Exception
        The distribution this this node, given input x.
        Returns:
        p( y_j = k | x , y_pred ) for k in {0,1}
        Throws:
        Exception

      • distributionT

        public double[] distributionT​(weka.core.Instance x_)
                       throws Exception
        Same as #distribution(Instance, double[]), but the Instance is pre-transformed with ypred inside.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • sample

        public double sample​(weka.core.Instance x,
                     double[] ypred,
                     Random r)
              throws Exception
        Sample the distribution given by #distribution(Instance, double[]).
        Returns:
        y_j ~ p( y_i | x , y_pred )
        Throws:
        Exception

        public weka.core.Instance transform​(weka.core.Instance x,

      • classify

        public double classify​(weka.core.Instance x,
                       double[] ypred)
                throws Exception
        Return the argmax on #distribution(Instance, double[]).
        Returns:
        argmax_{k in 0,1,...} p( y_j = k | x , y_pred )
        Throws:
        Exception

        Parameters:
        D - original Instances
        c - to be the class Attribute
